import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function MatchCard(props) { const fixData = props.matchData const data = new Date(fixData?.status?.utcTime); const mese = ("0" + (data.getMonth() + 1)).slice(-2); const giorno = ("0" + data.getDate()).slice(-2); const dataFormattata = `${mese}/${giorno}`; console.log(fixData) return (
{fixData?.home?.name}
{!fixData?.status?.started && !fixData?.status?.finished ? ( <>
{fixData?.status?.scoreStr}
{fixData?.status?.liveTime?.long}'
) : ( fixData?.ongoing === true ? (
{fixData?.status?.scoreStr}
) : ( <>
{fixData?.status?.scoreStr}
{fixData?.status?.liveTime?.long}'
) )}
{fixData?.away?.name}
) } export default MatchCard
